Reviews.Title: “Good value, good location”
Reviews.Author: TheBronwyn
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel week december arrived morning flight landed 4am hotel 6am staff kindly uncleaned changed refresh ourselves perfectly fine clean lightrail road hotel morning noise breakfast hotel short walk major tourist attractions walked lovely time

Reviews.Title: “Will never stay in this hotel again!”
Reviews.Author: ShadowUZ
Reviews.Content: booked hotel trip istanbul celebrate eve chose hotel positive feedback guests bookingcom main criteria selection cleanness location price size hotel booked requested arrived dirty talked reception tried defend staff didnt expect turkey client oriented hotel guess day wife checked bed frame dusty moreover cleaning staff dropped socks dusty floor dirty unpleasant didnt tell socks dust reception answer complained finally complaint cleaned properly paid 80 eurnight expensive type hotel istanbul paid holiday season paid 18 eur persons airport pick 10 eur drop hotel arranged request anyway bad impression hotel location dont stay hotel care cleanness hotel stay pay extra money stay hotel time

Reviews.Title: “Hospitality and welcoming”
Reviews.Author: MichiMadrid
Reviews.Content: stay istanbul unforgettable location short walk distance sightseeing visit blue mosque hagia sophia topkapi palace grand bazaar cistern spice market stay comfortable kept clean appreciated bed firm comfortable staff proffesional honest helpful downstairs delight modern shop choose turkish delights sweets service useful beverages heard soon rooftop bar wonderful view city requested istanbul im lovely quality sevice price oldcity viva simply excellent

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great service.”
Reviews.Author: yogi42
Reviews.Content: reserved triple couple grown child clean modern spacious staff responded immediately request breakfast vegetarians hotel provides services internet airport transfers rooftop deck driver met airport complimentary transfer available night stay reach tourist site restaurants hotel five minutes walk negative noise night outside hotel bring ear plugs highly recommend

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, great people!”
Reviews.Author: VictoriasSecretAngel
Reviews.Content: stayed city viva hotel 5 friends perfect location shops street hotel foot clean excellent breakfast staff nice helpful hotel chic modern cafe famous turkish delights cakes time istanbul definitely stayed viva

Reviews.Title: “Good service, nice rooms”
Reviews.Author: Jea91
Reviews.Content: situated walking distance shopping restaurants bars attentive waiters service trying help maximum ok bathrooms space finished bar coffeeshop downstairs trying hotel lots offers internet slow breakfast europeans

Reviews.Title: “would book in here again”
Reviews.Author: dartsteam
Reviews.Content: 10 friends returned 4 day stay city viva hotel owners staff excellent trouble stay memorable hesitate recommending hotel family friends return istanbul stay

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Karma_Dharma
Reviews.Content: found city viva trip advisor disappoint location walking distance major attractions ferry port train station city etc turkish breakfast morning excellent complaint thin walls otherwise staff level service amazing friendly helpful welcoming definitely recommend hotel travelling turkey

Reviews.Title: “Best option in old Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Orri
Reviews.Content: viva hotel option found cheap accomodation istanbul location service nice easy strongly recommend hotel business pleasure 7080 usd restaurant cafe street enjoy drink daily action istanbul restaurants taxi tram pass distance brilliant hotel

Reviews.Title: “hotel from hell”
Reviews.Author: stokie12
Reviews.Content: people stayed 2 weeks recomend hotel entertainment kids entertainment 1015 inclusive finishing drink 1030 dead line staff helpfull bar manager whith lesson proper people skills ive week am running toilet told drink water drink plastic glasses washed tap water straight wet food brilliant unless chicken pasta 9 marmaris stayed

Reviews.Title: “Great value!”
Reviews.Author: LJ2009London
Reviews.Content: hotel renovated stayed clean lots storage space bed comfy value paid breakfast probably id thoughout trip turkey 5 mins walk main sites stay recommend friends

Reviews.Title: “Will come back!”
Reviews.Author: los_sz
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 nights viva hotel renewed modern comfortable beds breakfast ok close historic attractions walking minutes aya sofya topkapi archeological museum tram stop close taksim beyoglu 10 minutes ride lots shops nice restaurants nearby arrived bed sheets werent clean changed immediately staff couldnâ´t helpful fiendly hotel renewed added little humid front highly recommend hotel doesnt pay istanbul looking clean comfortable little hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good for The Price”
Reviews.Author: TFAcer
Reviews.Content: thanks owners employees service helped read talk price esspecially price hotel location superb close sultanahmet aya 1min tram station connects rest european istanbul 1 sound stayed renovating hotel im curious recommend hotel im im day
